name: Compliance Report [Darshit]
query:
with a as(
    select
        name as 'nm',
        insurance_date as 'id',
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), insurance_date) as 'insurance'
    from
        `tabItem`
    order by
        creation desc
),
aa as(
    select
        nm,
        id,
        concat(
            'Insurance',
            ' - ',
            `insurance`,
            ' ',
            'Days to go'
        ) as 'InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter'
    from
        a
    where
        id >= now() - interval 1 day
        and id <= now() + interval 30 day
),
b as(
    select
        name as 'nm1',
        fitness_dt as 'ft',
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), fitness_dt) as 'fitness'
    from
        `tabItem`
),
bb as(
    select
        nm1,
        ft,
        concat('Fitness', ' - ', `fitness`, ' ', 'Days to go') as 'FitnessCompleteDaysAfter'
    from
        b
    where
        ft >= now() - interval 1 day
        and ft <= now() + interval 30 day
),
c as(
    select
        name as 'nm2',
        pollution as 'pl',
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), pollution) as 'pollution'
    from
        `tabItem`
),
cc as(
    select
        nm2,
        pl,
        concat('PUC', ' - ', `pollution`, ' ', 'Days to go') as 'PUCCompleteDaysAfter'
    from
        c
    where
        pl >= now() - interval 1 day
        and pl <= now() + interval 30 day
)
select
    i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item',
    i.maker_model as 'Brand::160',
    i.model as 'Model::160',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date',
    -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date',
    -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date',
    -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion',
    InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date::200',
    concat(
        '<button class="btn btn-primary pt-0 pb-0 compliance-custom-event" data-name="',i.name,'">Update</button>'
    ) as '',
    i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier:-1'
from
    `tabItem` i
    left join aa on i.name = nm
    left join bb on i.name = nm1
    left join cc on i.name = nm2
where
    i.rto_register = 'Registered'
union
select
    i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item',
    i.maker_model as 'Brand',
    i.model as 'Model::120',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date',
    -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date',
    -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date',
    -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion',
    FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date',
    concat(
       '<button class="btn btn-primary pt-0 pb-0 compliance-custom-event" data-name="',i.name,'">Update</button>'
    ) as '',
        i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier'

from
    `tabItem` i
    left join aa on i.name = nm
    left join bb on i.name = nm1
    left join cc on i.name = nm2
where
    i.rto_register = 'Registered'
union
select
    i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item',
    i.maker_model as 'Brand',
    i.model as 'Model::120',
     DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date',
    -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date',
    -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date',
   -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion',
    PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date::120',
    concat(
         '<button class="btn btn-primary pt-0 pb-0 compliance-custom-event" data-name="',i.name,'">Update</button>'
    ) as '',
        i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier'

from
    `tabItem` i
    left join aa on i.name = nm
    left join bb on i.name = nm1
    left join cc on i.name = nm2
where
    i.rto_register = 'Registered'
union
select
    i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item',
    i.equipment_brand,
    i.equipment_model_no,
    DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date',
    -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date',
    -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion',
    DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date',
    -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter,
    InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date',
    concat(
        '<button class="btn btn-primary pt-0 pb-0 compliance-custom-event" data-name="',i.name,'">Update</button>'
    ) as '',
        i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier'

from
    `tabItem` i
    left join aa on i.name = nm
    left join bb on i.name = nm1
    left join cc on i.name = nm2
where
    i.rto_register = 'Not Registered'

name: Call History Per Employee
query: select cl.agent_name as 'Agent::150', cl.agent_number as 'Agent Number::150', cl.client_number as 'Client Number::150', cl.status as 'Status Of call::150', cl.call_duration as "Call Duration (In Seconds)", cl.recording_url as "Recording::350", CONCAT('Open Recording') as "Recoding::150" from `tabCall Logs` cl inner join `tabUser` u on u.phone = cl.agent_number inner join `tabEmployee` e on u.phone=e.cell_number where ( DATE(cl.creation) between %(from_date) s and %(to_date) s ) and cl.agent_number=e.cell_number order by cl.creation desc

name: Inquiry For Sell
query:
SELECT
    concat(`first_name`, ' ', `last_name`) as "Name",
    company_name as 'Company',
    email_address as 'Email',
    mobile_no as 'Mobile No',
    item_details as 'Equipment Details',
    inquiry_source as 'Inquiry Source'
FROM
    `tabInquiry Form`
WHERE
    request = 'Sell'
    and   (
       DATE(creation) between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )

query:

    inquiry_source as 'Inquiry Source'
FROM

WHERE

      and   (
       DATE(creation) between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )

query:
SELECT

    status as "Status",
    type as "Type",
    email_id as "Email",
    mobile_no as "Mobile no",

    and   (

name: Inquiry Analytics
query:
with daily as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
week as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
quarterly as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 14 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
monthly as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 30 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
)
select
    i.request as 'Request Type::200',
    count(i.request) as 'Total::180',
    count(daily.request) as "Today::180",
    count(week.request) as "In 7 Days::180",
    count(quarterly.request) as "In 15 Days::180",
    count(monthly.request) as "In 30 Days::180"
from
    `tabInquiry Form` i
    left outer join daily on daily.request = i.request
    and daily.creation = i.creation
    left outer join week on week.request = i.request
    and week.creation = i.creation
    left outer join quarterly on quarterly.request = i.request
    and quarterly.creation = i.creation
    left outer join monthly on monthly.request = i.request
    and monthly.creation = i.creation

group by
    i.request

name: report
query:
WITH working as(
       select
              supplier,
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Working'
       group by
              item_group,
               equipment_status
),
ideal as(
       select
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Ideal'
       group by
              item_group
),
breakdown as(
       select
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Breakdown'
       group by
              item_group
)

select
       i.supplier as 'S:Link/Supplier:-10',
       ig.item_group_name as 'Item Group:Link/Item Group',
       count(i.item_group) as 'Total',
       count(working.equipment_status) as 'Working',
       count(ideal.equipment_status) as 'Ideal',
       count(breakdown.equipment_status) as 'BreakDown'
       
from
       `tabItem Group` ig
       left outer JOIN `tabItem` i ON i.item_group = ig.item_group_name
       
       left outer JOIN working on ig.item_group_name = working.item_group
       and working.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
       
       left outer JOIN ideal on ig.item_group_name = ideal.item_group
       and ideal.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
       
       left outer JOIN breakdown on ig.item_group_name = breakdown.item_group
       and breakdown.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
       
where
       ig.parent_item_group = 'All Equipment Groups'
       and i.equipment_for_sell = 1
       
group by
       ig.item_group_name

name: Verify Supplier
query:
WITH difference_in_seconds AS (
SELECT
s.name_of_suppier AS "SupplierName",
s.mobile_number AS "MobileNumber",
s.email AS "Email",
TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,s.creation,s.verify_time) AS seconds
FROM `tabSupplier` AS s
where
s.verify="Verify"
),

differences AS (
  SELECT
  SupplierName,
  MobileNumber,
  Email ,
  seconds,
  MOD(seconds, 60) AS seconds_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600) AS minutes_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600 * 24) AS hours_part
  FROM difference_in_seconds
)

SELECT
  SupplierName as "Name::300",
  MobileNumber as "Number::230",
  Email as "Email::300",
  CONCAT(
    FLOOR(seconds / 3600 / 24), ' days ',
    FLOOR(hours_part / 3600), ' hours ',
    FLOOR(minutes_part / 60), ' minutes ',
    seconds_part, ' seconds'
  ) AS "Supplier Verified After Creation::300"
FROM differences;

name: Equipment
query:
WITH difference_in_seconds AS (
SELECT
s.item_name AS "EquipmentName",
s.item_group AS "maincategory",
s.equipment_main_category AS "subcategory",
s.supplier AS "supplier",
s.supplier_name as "sn",
s.whatsapp_no as "snum",
s.creation as 'time',

TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,s.creation,s.verify_time) AS seconds
FROM `tabItem` AS s
WHERE
s.equipment_verify="Verify"

),

differences AS (
  SELECT
  EquipmentName,
  maincategory,
  subcategory,
  supplier,
  sn,
  snum,
  time,
 
  seconds,
  MOD(seconds, 60) AS seconds_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600) AS minutes_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600 * 24) AS hours_part
  FROM difference_in_seconds
)

SELECT
  EquipmentName as "Name",
  maincategory as "Main Category",
  subcategory as "Sub Category",
  supplier as "Supplier",
  sn as "Supplier Name",
  snum as "Supplier Number",
 

  CONCAT(
    FLOOR(seconds / 3600 / 24), ' days ',
    FLOOR(hours_part / 3600), ' hours ',
    FLOOR(minutes_part / 60), ' minutes ',
    seconds_part, ' seconds'
  ) AS "Difference"
FROM differences

order by time desc

name: Supplier Wise Equipment List
query:
with  aerial as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as aeri
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Aerial Work Platform'
group by supplier),

concrete as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as conc
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Concrete Machinery'
group by supplier),

crane as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as cran
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Cranes'
group by supplier),

earth as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as eart
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Earth Moving Machinery'
group by supplier),

lifting as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as lift
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Lifting and Handling Machinery'
group by supplier),

miscellaneous as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as misc
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Miscellaneous'
group by supplier),

plant as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as plan
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Plant Crushing and Screening'
group by supplier),

road as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as roads
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Road Machinery'
group by supplier),

truck as(select supplier as 's',
item_group,
count(name) as truc
from `tabItem`
where item_group='Truck / Tanker / Trailor'
group by supplier)

select 
i.supplier_company as 'Company::150',
i.supplier_name as 'Supplier Name',
count(i.name) as 'Total Equipments',
aeri as 'Aerial::80',
conc as 'Concrete::80',
cran as 'Cranes::80',
eart as 'Earthmoving::80',
lift as 'Lifting::80',
misc as 'Miscellaneous::80',
plan as 'Plant::80',
roads as 'Road::80',
truc as 'Truck/Tanker::80',
i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier:-1'

from `tabItem` i

left join aerial on i.supplier=aerial.s
left join concrete on i.supplier=concrete.s
left join crane on i.supplier=crane.s
left join earth on i.supplier=earth.s
left join lifting on i.supplier=lifting.s
left join miscellaneous on i.supplier=miscellaneous.s
left join plant on i.supplier=plant.s
left join road on i.supplier=road.s
left join truck on i.supplier=truck.s

group by supplier

name: Rental Report
query:
select 
si.customer,
sii.item_code ,
count(sii.qty),
sii.amount


from `tabSales Invoice Item` sii

join `tabSales Invoice` si
on sii.parent = si.name

where si.request_type='Rent'

group by sii.parent,sii.item_code,si.customer

name: Equipment For sell Or Rent Report
query:
with sell as(
    select
        item_group,
        equipment_for_sell,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        equipment_for_sell = 1
    group by
        equipment_main_category
),

rent as(
    select
        item_group,
        equipment_for_sell,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        equipment_for_rent = 1
    group by
        equipment_main_category
),

compliance as(
    select
        item_group,
        insurance,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        insurance = 1
        
    group by
        equipment_main_category
)

select
    i.equipment_main_category as 'Equipment Sub Category::300',
    count(i.equipment_main_category) as 'Total::300',
    count(sell.equipment_main_category) as 'Sell::300',
    count(rent.equipment_main_category) as 'Rent::300',
    count(compliance.equipment_main_category) as 'Compliance::300'
from
    `tabItem` i
    
    left join sell on sell.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.equipment_for_sell = sell.equipment_for_sell
    
    left join rent on rent.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.equipment_for_sell = rent.equipment_for_sell
    
    left join compliance on compliance.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.insurance = compliance.insurance
    
  
where
    i.equipment_for_sell = 1
    or i.equipment_for_rent = 1
    or i.insurance =1 
    
group by
    i.equipment_main_category
report_name: Equipment For sell Or Rent Report

name: Daily Supplier Report
query:
select
    supplier_name as 'Name::200',
    verify as 'Verified Or Not::200',
    company_name as 'Company Name::250',
    mobile_number as 'Mobile No::200',
    email as 'Email::250'
from
    `tabSupplier`
where
    (
        DATE(creation) between %(from_date) s
        and %(to_date) s
    )

name: Lead Analytics
query:
WITH daily AS (
    SELECT
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation,
        l.name
    FROM
        `tabLead` l
    LEFT outer JOIN `tabRequest Types` rt ON l.name = rt.parent
    WHERE
        l.creation >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
    GROUP BY
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation
),
week AS (
    SELECT
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation,
        l.name
    FROM
        `tabLead` l
    LEFT outer JOIN `tabRequest Types` rt ON l.name = rt.parent
    WHERE
        l.creation >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
    GROUP BY
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation
),
quarterly AS (
    SELECT
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation,
        l.name
    FROM
        `tabLead` l
    LEFT outer JOIN `tabRequest Types` rt ON l.name = rt.parent
    WHERE
        l.creation >= NOW() - INTERVAL 15 DAY
    GROUP BY
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation
),
monthly AS (
    SELECT
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation,
        l.name
    FROM
        `tabLead` l
    LEFT outer JOIN `tabRequest Types` rt ON l.name = rt.parent
    WHERE
        l.creation >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY
    GROUP BY
        rt.request_type,
        l.creation
)
SELECT
    rt.request_type AS 'Request Type::145',
    COUNT(rt.request_type) AS 'Total::200',
    COUNT(daily.request_type) AS "Today::200",
    COUNT(week.request_type) AS "In 7 Days::200",
    COUNT(quarterly.request_type) AS "In 15 Days::200",
    COUNT(monthly.request_type) AS "In 30 Days::200"
FROM
    `tabRequest Types` rt
LEFT outer JOIN `tabLead` i ON i.name = rt.parent
LEFT outer JOIN daily ON daily.request_type = rt.request_type AND daily.creation = i.creation
LEFT outer JOIN week ON week.request_type = rt.request_type AND week.creation = i.creation
LEFT outer JOIN quarterly ON quarterly.request_type = rt.request_type AND quarterly.creation = i.creation
LEFT outer JOIN monthly ON monthly.request_type = rt.request_type AND monthly.creation = i.creation
GROUP BY
    rt.request_type;

name: Supplier Verified or Not report
query:
with verified as (
    select
        name,
        verify
    from
        `tabSupplier`
    where
        verify = 'Verify'
),

notverify AS (
    select
        name,
        verify
    from
        `tabSupplier`
    where
        verify = 'Not Verify'
   
)

select
    count(s.verify) as 'Total Supplier::380',
    count(verified.verify) 'Verified Supplier::380',
     count(notverify.verify) 'Not Verified Supplier::380'
   
    
from
 `tabSupplier` s
    
left outer JOIN verified on verified.name=s.name
left outer JOIN notverify on notverify.name=s.name

name: Supplier and Equipment Report
query:
WITH difference_in_seconds AS (
    select
        date(s.creation) as 'SupplierCreatedDate',
        s.supplier_name as 'Supplier',
        i.name as '1stEquipment',
        date(i.creation) as 'EquipmentCreatedDate',
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, s.creation, i.creation) AS seconds
    from
        `tabSupplier` s
        inner join `tabItem` i on s.name = i.supplier
        
        where s.verify='Verify'
),
differences AS (
    SELECT
        Supplier as 's',
        SupplierCreatedDate as 'a',
        1stEquipment as 'b',
        EquipmentCreatedDate as 'c',
        seconds,
        MOD(seconds, 60) AS seconds_part,
        MOD(seconds, 3600) AS minutes_part,
        MOD(seconds, 3600 * 24) AS hours_part
    FROM
        difference_in_seconds
)
select
    s as 'Supplier::200',
    a as 'Supplier Creation Date',
    b as '1st Equipment of Supplier',
    c as '1st Equipment Created By Supplier',
    CONCAT(
        FLOOR(seconds / 3600 / 24),
        ' days ',
        FLOOR(hours_part / 3600),
        ' hours ',
        FLOOR(minutes_part / 60),
        ' minutes ',
        seconds_part,
        ' seconds'
    ) AS 'Creation Difference of Supplier and 1st Equipment '
FROM
    differences
group by
    s
order by
    c desc

name: Lead For Rent
query:
SELECT
    lead_name as "Name",
    company_name as "Company Name::100",
    l.status as "Status",
    type as "Lead Type",
    email_id as "Email::140",
    l.mobile_no as "Mobile no",
    city as "City",
    state as "State",
    lead_owner as "Lead Owner",
      request_type as 'Request Type:Link/Request Type',
    e.name as 'Employee:Link/Employee:-1'

FROM
    `tabLead` l
 
right join `tabEmployee` e
on e.user_id=l.lead_owner

WHERE
    request_type = 'Rent'
    and   (
       DATE(l.creation) between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )

name: Equipment Status Wise Report
query:
WITH working as(
       select
              supplier,
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Working'
       group by
              item_group,
               equipment_status
),
ideal as(
       select
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Ideal'
       group by
              item_group
),
breakdown as(
       select
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Breakdown'
       group by
              item_group
),
occupied as(
       select
              item_group,
         equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Occupied With Migoo'
       group by
              item_group
),
free as(
       select
              item_group,
              equipment_status
       from
              `tabItem`
       where
              equipment_status = 'Free'
       group by
              item_group
)
select
       ig.item_group_name as 'Item Group:Link/Item Group:239.5',
       count(i.item_group) as 'Total::180',
       count(working.equipment_status) as 'Working::180',
       count(ideal.equipment_status) as 'Ideal::180',
       count(breakdown.equipment_status) as 'BreakDown::180',
       count(free.equipment_status) as 'Free::180',
        i.supplier as 'S:Link/Supplier:-10'
from
       `tabItem Group` ig
       left outer JOIN `tabItem` i ON i.item_group = ig.item_group_name
       left outer JOIN working on ig.item_group_name = working.item_group
       and working.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
       left outer JOIN ideal on ig.item_group_name = ideal.item_group
       and ideal.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
       left outer JOIN breakdown on ig.item_group_name = breakdown.item_group
       and breakdown.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
      
       left outer JOIN free on ig.item_group_name = free.item_group
       and free.equipment_status = i.equipment_status
where
       ig.parent_item_group = 'All Equipment Groups'
       
group by
       ig.item_group_name

name: Insurance Report
query:
select
i.supplier,
i.supplier_name,
i.item_code as 'Equipment:link/Item',
i.insurance_date as 'Insurance Complete Date',
s.mobile_number as 'Supplier Contact No'

from `tabItem` i

inner join `tabSupplier` s
on s.supplier_name= i.supplier_name

where 
      insurance_date >= CURDATE()
  AND  insurance_date < CURDATE() + INTERVAL 15 DAY

name: Supplier Verification Report
query:
WITH difference_in_seconds AS (
  SELECT
    s.name_of_suppier AS "SupplierName",
    s.mobile_number AS "MobileNumber",
    s.email AS "Email",
    s.creation as "creation",
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, s.creation, s.verify_time) AS seconds
  FROM
    `tabSupplier` AS s
  where
    s.verify = "Verify"
),
differences AS (
  SELECT
    SupplierName,
    MobileNumber,
    Email,
    seconds,
    creation,
    MOD(seconds, 60) AS seconds_part,
    MOD(seconds, 3600) AS minutes_part,
    MOD(seconds, 3600 * 24) AS hours_part
  FROM
    difference_in_seconds
)
SELECT
  SupplierName as "Name::240",
  MobileNumber as "Number::240",
  Email as "Email::240",
  CONCAT(
    FLOOR(seconds / 3600 / 24),
    ' days ',
    FLOOR(hours_part / 3600),
    ' hours ',
    FLOOR(minutes_part / 60),
    ' minutes ',
    seconds_part,
    ' seconds'
  ) AS "Supplier Verified After Creation::350"
FROM
  differences
where
  (
    DATE(creation) between %(from_date) s
    and %(to_date) s
  )

name: Equipment Verification Report
query:
WITH difference_in_seconds AS (
SELECT
s.item_name AS "EquipmentName",
s.item_group AS "maincategory",
s.equipment_main_category AS "subcategory",
s.supplier AS "supplier",
s.supplier_name as "sn",
s.whatsapp_no as "snum",
s.creation as 'time',

TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,s.creation,s.verify_time) AS seconds
FROM `tabItem` AS s
WHERE
s.equipment_verify="Verify"

),

differences AS (
  SELECT
  EquipmentName,
  maincategory,
  subcategory,
  supplier,
  sn,
  snum,
  time,
 
  seconds,
  MOD(seconds, 60) AS seconds_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600) AS minutes_part,
  MOD(seconds, 3600 * 24) AS hours_part
  FROM difference_in_seconds
)

SELECT
  EquipmentName as "Name::120",
  maincategory as "Main Category::180",
  subcategory as "Sub Category::180",
  supplier as "Supplier",
  sn as "Supplier Name::180",
  snum as "Supplier Number",
 

  CONCAT(
    FLOOR(seconds / 3600 / 24), ' days ',
    FLOOR(hours_part / 3600), ' hours ',
    FLOOR(minutes_part / 60), ' minutes ',
    seconds_part, ' seconds'
  ) AS "Difference::350"
FROM differences

where
  (
    DATE(time) between %(from_date) s
    and %(to_date) s
  )

order by time desc

name: Currently Equipment On Rent
query:
select
so.customer as 'Customer',
soi.item_code as 'Equipment',
count(soi.qty) as 'Quantity::150',
soi.amount as 'Amount'
from `tabSales Order` so

inner join `tabSales Order Item` soi
on soi.parent=so.name

where so.request_type="Rent"
group by soi.parent,soi.item_code,so.customer

name: Equipment Rent on Past
query:
select 
si.customer,
sii.item_code ,
count(sii.qty),
sii.amount


from `tabSales Invoice Item` sii

join `tabSales Invoice` si
on sii.parent = si.name

where si.request_type='Rent'

group by sii.parent,sii.item_code,si.customer

query:

eq.reference_name as 'Equipment Name',
i.equipment_main_category as 'Equipment Sub Category',
eq.creation as 'Email Send Date',
i.insurance_date as 'Insurance Date' ,
i.supplier_name as 'Supplier Name',
i.whatsapp_no as 'Supplier Whatsapp No',
i.supplier_email as 'Supplier Email',
eq.status as 'Email Status'

from `tabEmail Queue` eq

inner join `tabItem` i 
on eq.reference_name=i.name

where eq.reference_doctype='Item' and 
  
    (
      eq.creation between %(from_date) s
       and %(to_date) s
   )

name: Fitness Expire Email Report
query:

eq.reference_doctype as 'Reference Doctype',
eq.reference_name as 'Equipment Name',
i.equipment_main_category as 'Equipment Sub Category',
date(eq.creation) as 'Email Send Date',
i.fitness_dt as 'Fitness Date' ,
i.supplier_name as 'Supplier Name',
i.whatsapp_no as 'Supplier Whatsapp No',
i.supplier_email as 'Supplier Email',
eq.status as 'Email Status'

from `tabEmail Queue` eq

inner join `tabItem` i 
on eq.reference_name=i.name

where eq.reference_doctype='Item'

name: Compliance Report
query: with a as( select name as 'nm', insurance_date as 'id', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), insurance_date) as 'insurance' from `tabItem` order by creation desc ), aa as( select nm, id, concat( 'Insurance', ' - ', `insurance`, ' ', 'Days to go' ) as 'InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter' from a where id >= now() - interval 1 day and id <= now() + interval 30 day ), b as( select name as 'nm1', fitness_dt as 'ft', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), fitness_dt) as 'fitness' from `tabItem` ), bb as( select nm1, ft, concat('Fitness', ' - ', `fitness`, ' ', 'Days to go') as 'FitnessCompleteDaysAfter' from b where ft >= now() - interval 1 day and ft <= now() + interval 30 day ), c as( select name as 'nm2', pollution as 'pl', TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, now(), pollution) as 'pollution' from `tabItem` ), cc as( select nm2, pl, concat('PUC', ' - ', `pollution`, ' ', 'Days to go') as 'PUCCompleteDaysAfter' from c where pl >= now() - interval 1 day and pl <= now() + interval 30 day ) select i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item', i.maker_model as 'Brand::160', i.model as 'Model::160', DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date', -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date', -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date', -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion', InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date::200', concat( '' ) as '', i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier:-1' from `tabItem` i left join aa on i.name = nm left join bb on i.name = nm1 left join cc on i.name = nm2 where i.rto_register = 'Registered' union select i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item', i.maker_model as 'Brand', i.model as 'Model::120', DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date', -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date', -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date', -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion', FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date', concat( '' ) as '', i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier' from `tabItem` i left join aa on i.name = nm left join bb on i.name = nm1 left join cc on i.name = nm2 where i.rto_register = 'Registered' union select i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item', i.maker_model as 'Brand', i.model as 'Model::120', DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date', -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date', -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date', -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'PUC Completion', PUCCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date::120', concat( '' ) as '', i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier' from `tabItem` i left join aa on i.name = nm left join bb on i.name = nm1 left join cc on i.name = nm2 where i.rto_register = 'Registered' union select i.name as 'Equipment:Link/Item', i.equipment_brand, i.equipment_model_no, DATE_FORMAT(i.insurance_date,'%%d-%%m-%%Y')as 'Insurance Last Date', -- InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Insurance Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.fitness_dt,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'Fitness Last Date', -- FitnessCompleteDaysAfter as 'Fitness Completion', DATE_FORMAT(i.pollution,'%%d-%%m-%%Y') as 'PUC Last Date', -- PUCCompleteDaysAfter, InsuranceCompleteDaysAfter as 'Completion Date', concat( '' ) as '', i.supplier as 'Supplier:Link/Supplier' from `tabItem` i left join aa on i.name = nm left join bb on i.name = nm1 left join cc on i.name = nm2 where i.rto_register = 'Not Registered'

name: Enquiry Analytics
query:
with daily as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
week as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
quarterly as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 14 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
),
monthly as(
    select
        request,
        creation,
        name
    from
        `tabInquiry Form`
    where
        creation >= now() - INTERVAL 30 DAY
    group by
        request,
        creation
)
select
    i.request as 'Request Type::160',
    count(i.request) as 'Total::193',
    count(daily.request) as "Today::193",
    count(week.request) as "In 7 Days::193",
    count(quarterly.request) as "In 15 Days::193",
    count(monthly.request) as "In 30 Days::193"
from
    `tabInquiry Form` i
    left outer join daily on daily.request = i.request
    and daily.creation = i.creation
    left outer join week on week.request = i.request
    and week.creation = i.creation
    left outer join quarterly on quarterly.request = i.request
    and quarterly.creation = i.creation
    left outer join monthly on monthly.request = i.request
    and monthly.creation = i.creation
where i.request!=''
group by
    i.request

name: Work Done By Employees
query:
SELECT
  u.name AS "Name:Link/User:200",
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabItem` WHERE owner = u.name) AS "Equipment::165",
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabSupplier` WHERE owner_name = u.name) AS "Supplier::165",
 (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabCustomer` WHERE owner = u.name) AS "Customer::165",
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabLead` WHERE lead_owner = u.name) AS "Lead::165",
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabOpportunity` WHERE opportunity_owner = u.name) AS "Opportunity::165",
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
 FROM `tabQuotation` WHERE owner = u.name) AS "Quotation::165"
  
FROM
  `tabUser` u
WHERE
  u.module_profile = "Sales Team"
GROUP BY u.name

name: Work Done By Employee
query: SELECT  u.name AS "Name::170",  u.phone AS "Phone No::150",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabItem`    WHERE      owner = u.name  ) AS "Equipment::140",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabSupplier`    WHERE      owner_name = u.name  ) AS "Supplier::140",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabCall Logs`    WHERE      agent_number = u.phone  ) AS "Call Logs::140",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabLead`    WHERE      lead_owner = u.name  ) AS "Lead::120",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabOpportunity`    WHERE      opportunity_owner = u.name  ) AS "Opportunity::140",  (    SELECT      COUNT(*)    FROM      `tabQuotation`    WHERE      owner = u.name  ) AS "Quotation::140"FROM  `tabUser` uWHERE  u.module_profile = "Sales Team"GROUP BY  u.name

name: Equipment For sell Or Rent Or Compliance
query:
with sell as(
    select
        item_group,
        equipment_for_sell,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        equipment_for_sell = 1
    group by
        equipment_main_category
),

rent as(
    select
        item_group,
        equipment_for_sell,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        equipment_for_rent = 1
    group by
        equipment_main_category
),

compliance as(
    select
        item_group,
        insurance,
        equipment_main_category
    from
        `tabItem`
    where
        insurance = 1
        
    group by
        equipment_main_category
)

select
    i.equipment_main_category as 'Equipment Sub Category::300',
    count(i.equipment_main_category) as 'Total::300',
    count(sell.equipment_main_category) as 'Sell::300',
    count(rent.equipment_main_category) as 'Rent::300',
    count(compliance.equipment_main_category) as 'Compliance::300'
from
    `tabItem` i
    
    left join sell on sell.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.equipment_for_sell = sell.equipment_for_sell
    
    left join rent on rent.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.equipment_for_sell = rent.equipment_for_sell
    
    left join compliance on compliance.equipment_main_category = i.equipment_main_category
    and i.insurance = compliance.insurance
    
  
where
    i.equipment_for_sell = 1
    or i.equipment_for_rent = 1
    or i.insurance =1 
    
group by
    i.equipment_main_category
report_name: Equipment For sell Or Rent Or Compliance
